item.description:
Interested people,

We are now into spring, although it may not feel like it, we would like you to join us this Saturday. All are welcome to play flag-football. We enjoy having new people come, and your skill level does not matter. Some of us are good, some of us are bad, but we all have fun. Hope you can join us.

Saturday 2PM at Russell Field - from the Alewife 'T' stop just across the Alewife Brook Parkway, adjacent to Rindge Ave.

Please respond whether you can or cannot make it.

Thanks!
item.name: FLAG FOOTBALL - SAT 2PM RUSSELL FIELD
